prompts: Create a muscular Pokemon with four arms and a fierce expression.
I want a Pokemon that can lift heavy objects and has a blue-gray body.
Generate a fighting-type Pokemon known for its incredible strength and speed.
Make a character design for a Pokemon that excels in hand-to-hand combat.
Imagine a Pokemon with a confident stance and a strong personality.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and is highly competitive.
Show me a powerful Pokemon with bulging muscles and a determined look.
